descriptors.description: Demonstrates Certificate Based Authentication and Pairing over BLE. This example utilizes TrustZone for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_csr_generator_tz_workspace
descriptors.label: bt_soc_csr_generator_tz_workspace
descriptors.description: Certificate generating firmware workspace. Software is generating the device EC key pair, the signing request for the device certificate, and other related data. The generated data can be read out by the Central Authority. This example utilizes TrustZone for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_abr_ncp_initiator
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - ABR NCP
descriptors.description: ABR Network Co-Processor (NCP) target application. Runs the Bluetooth stack and provides access to it by exposing the Bluetooth API (BGAPI) via UART connection. NCP mode makes it possible to run your application on a host controller or PC. This example does not have a GATT database, but makes it possible to build one from the application using Dynamic GATT API.

descriptors.name: bt_abr_soc_initiator
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC ABR initiator
descriptors.description: ABR initiator for Bluetooth. The example connects to an ABR reflector and starts distance measurement. Results are printed on the display of the WSTK.

descriptors.name: bt_abr_soc_reflector
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC ABR reflector
descriptors.description: ABR reflector for Bluetooth. The example sends measurement results to the initiator via GATT. The application starts advertising after boot and restarts advertising after a connection is closed. It also supports Over-the-Air Device Firmware Upgrade (OTA DFU).

descriptors.name: bt_soc_cbap
descriptors.label: Bluetooth - SoC Certificate Based Authentication and Pairing (Secure Vault)
descriptors.description: Demonstrates Certificate Based Authentication and Pairing over BLE. This example utilizes Secure Vault for storing keys.

descriptors.name: bt_soc_tz_secure_application
descriptors.label: Sample project for TrustZone Secure Key Library
descriptors.description: This project can be used as a reference implementation for creating secure applications with TrustZone for bluetooth products. This project makes a TrustZone secure library for running PSA libraries in the secure world.
